summary: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.
cast: Michael Caine|Emily Mortimer|Charlie Creed-Miles|David Bradley|Iain Glen|Sean Harris|Plan B|Jack O'Connell|Jamie Downey|Lee Oakes|Joseph Gilgun|Liam Cunningham|Marva Alexander|Liz Daniels|Marvin Campbell|Lauretta Gavin|Radoslaw Kaim|Claire Hackett|Ashley McGuire|Raza Jaffrey|Martin Wilde|Sian Milne|Klariza Clayton|Grace Vallorani|Sue Farr|Forbes KB|Michelle Tate|Orla O'Rourke|Andy Pilgrim|Aldonio Danny Frietas|Mens-Sana Tamakloe|Rob Hunt|Gary Hoptrough|Gary Connery|Amanda Foster|Charles Ramsay|Pete Ford|Andy Merchant|Ian van Temperley|Erol Mehmet|Roy Taylor|Chris Pollard|Amy Steel|Robert Styles|Andy Wareham|Tony Massiah|Ian Pead|Belinda McGinley|Ashley George|Amy Edge|Paul Buchanan|Lee Edgar|Martin Heathcote|Karl Rhodes|Laurence Richardson|Chris Wilson
title: Harry Brown
